title: Coming Soon: Season 2 of Words to Win By
description: On season 2 of Words to Win By, we're going from Switzerland to Arizona and from the Dominican Republic to West Virginia to unpack some of the fiercest fights - and biggest come-from-behind victories - for progressives. For each of these stories, we examine the words, tactics and strategies needed to take on entrenched parties and defy expectations to win. Season 2 premieres November 9th.
author: pod@wondermedianetwork.com (Wonder Media Network, Anat Shenker-Osorio)
